passage_text: French Meaning: The name Adrianna is a French baby name. In French the meaning of the name Adrianna is: From Adria, the Adriatic sea region. Also means dark. American Meaning: The name Adriana is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Adriana is: Dark. Latin Meaning: The name Adriana is a Latin baby name. In Latin the meaning of the name Adriana is: from the Latin Hadrianus meaning of Adria, or of the Adriatic. Also means dark. Shakespearean Meaning: The name Adriana is a Shakespearean baby name.

Adrianna is a form of the name Adrian. Adrianna is a variant spelling of Adrienne. Adrianna has the diminutive (nickname) Adrie. Adrianna falls into the place name category. Adrianna is generally used as a girl's name. It consists of 8 letters and 4 syllables and is pronounced A-dri-a-nna. In the U.S. in 2014, it ranked 252 in baby name popularity for girls with 1272 occurrences.

Adrianna. Is the name of a very sexy and attractive young woman. Originally from Italian, meaning dark or rich, this girl is usually of hispanic descent. She has deep brown eyes, long black hair and her alluring personality makes everyone want to become her friend.

Adrianna has its origins in the Latin language. It is used largely in the English and Polish languages. Adrianna is a variant of Adriana (Czech, English, German, Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slavic, and Spanish). Adrianna is popular as a baby girl name, and it is also viewed as trendy. Adrianna /adri-an-na/ [4 sylls.] as a name for girls. Adrianna's name origin is Latin, and Adrianna means from Hadria. Adrianna is a variant transcription of Adrienne (Latin): French feminine transcription of Adrian. Adriano is a conventional surname. Kreatif forms: Adrianau, Adrianla, Adriannaau.
Adrianna is a Latin name, meaning Person from Hadria (a place in northern Italy). it means loving cares for others. Adrianna is actually #17 on the best name list of 2009 so far.
